martyr.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who dies for their religious or political beliefs and is admired by people for this
martyr.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: St Stephen, the first Christian martyr
The army has been held back because the government is reluctant to make martyrs of the protesters.
He was a martyr to the cause of racial harmony.
martyr.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who tries hard to get other people’s sympathy by complaining about how hard their life is – used to show disapproval
martyr.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I think she rather relishes the role of martyr.
martyr.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if someone is martyred, they are killed because of their religious beliefs
martyr.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Catherine was martyred for her faith.
